full_summary:
Performance Management Framework Solution for Department of National Defence
===============================================

**Solicitation Number:** W8485-TSSB2023-01/A

**Closing Date:** January 27, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Amendment:** 1

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites pre-qualified supply arrangement holders under E60ZT-16TSSB to submit a proposal for a Performance Management Framework (PMF) solution. The selected contractor will design, develop, deliver, and sustain a centralized business technology solution for the Director General Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM) to capture and monitor key performance indicators related to Materiel Acquisition and Support (MA&S) services provided to the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF).

**Key Requirements:**

* Develop a PMF solution that captures and monitors key performance indicators related to MA&S services
* Identify any changes with respect to DGAEPM performance and predict future outcomes based on selected courses of action
* Design and implement a centralized business technology solution for the DGAEPM

**Eligibility:**
Only pre-qualified supply arrangement holders under E60ZT-16TSSB, Stream 2, Business Consulting/Change Management Services, are eligible to submit a proposal. A list of invited suppliers is provided below:

* A Hundred Answers Inc.
* ACF Associates Inc.
* ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
* AECOM Canada Ltd.
* And 34 other companies...

**Timeline:**

* Proposal submission deadline: January 27, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Estimated timeframe of contract: February 1, 2023, to January 31, 2025, plus two (2) irrevocable option years

**Contact Information:**
For any inquiries or questions regarding this solicitation, please contact Sharon Sally at:

sharon.sally@forces.gc.ca
819-939-8990

Please note that the RFP documents are not available on the Government Electronic Tenders System (https://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders). They will be e-mailed directly by the DND Point of Contact to eligible supply arrangement holders.

**Security Clearance:**
Supplier security clearance required: Secret
Resource security clearance required: Secret
Security level required (document safeguarding): None

**Notice:**
This solicitation is open to eligible supply arrangement holders only. Only pre-qualified suppliers may submit a proposal. The deadline for proposal submission is January 27,
